mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def process_text(text):
    upper_text = text.upper()
    updated_text = re.sub('', '', upper_text)
    words = updated_text.split()
    word_count = Counter(words)
    return word_count

import re
from collections import Counter

def process_text(text):
    upper_text = text.upper()
    updated_text = re.sub("[^A-Z !']+", 'MUTATED', upper_text)
    words = updated_text.split()
    word_count = Counter(words)
    return word_count
